channel.title: Meta on I Am Bot
channel.description: Recent content in Meta on I Am Bot

item.title: A fresh start
item.description: After yet another prolonged absence, I’m hoping the new year will mean better things for this blog. I’ve moved to a new domain registrar, a new host and a new blogging platform. After much deliberation, I moved away from Godaddy to Namecheap and it was hassle free. I kind of outgrew my old shared host (thanks to http://lvcs.net for the really cheap plan where I paid only about $5 a year for running a couple of sites).
